article:
One winter day, two brothers went fishing. They had a dog with them. When they came near the river, they _ off their caps on a big stone and went to the river bank to look _ fish. It was _ that day, _ soon they began to want their caps. They _ the dog to get the caps back _ them.
When the dog got there ,he tried to take _ caps together in his mouth at the same time. It was very difficult. Then the dog noticed that one _ the caps was smaller _ the other. He put the smaller cap in the larger one and got them down with his foot and then he could carry the two caps at the same time.
